one_reviews_text:
this ia a VERY interesting way to read comics... its almost as if you're actualy in the pages of one...
pity there's so few of them... I wonder if an editor or more titles are in the works...

I like the effects of taking a comic book and bringing you into it. It has an interesting 2D/3D mix with music and some sound effects and some 360 degree scenes. Certainly makes a basic comic book more interesting. There are few comics that are in English, Japanese and Korean, but more in Korean. Most of them are just 1 or two short stories but would love to see longer series in English. I could see this eventually leading to in app purchases to more comics. What it has now is worth checking out if you enjoy comics. Had a weird thing where the hand would keep jumping to the center of my face and I think it is an intermediate tracking loss of the Rift S.

review_title: A Different Take on the VR Comic
one_reviews_text: Simple but effective, if you like some short stories this well done and not what I was expecting of a VR comic(s), worth the time to take a look.
was instead moved by Supernatural Girl T__T

many vr comics with japanese and english version , but no chinese :..(
the sotries are very enjoyable but too short .
